class.name: LoadListItem
class.brief_description: Resource defining load parameters for train cars.
class.description: LoadListItem is a resource class that defines loading parameters for train cars. It specifies the type of load (passenger or cargo), maximum load capacity, and load positioning within the car. This resource is used to configure how different types of train cars handle their cargo or passenger loads.

members.member: The offset of the load's center of mass from the car's center point in meters. Positive values shift the load towards the front of the car.
The type of load that this car is configured to carry. See LoadType enum for available options.
The maximum load weight in tons that this car can safely carry.

constants.constant: Car has no specific load type configuration.
